Text.Page:
Apparently, our enemies include the Scions of Lok. You've fought them before, haven't you?

The {@LinkCreature:22#30#dark cardinals} have trained the {@LinkCreature:22#29#diminutive ovoliths} to serve them, and they've secured the catacombs.

You have to stop them. Just kill them all.

The cultists will never face so-called federation justice. When we've reclaimed the Eldritch Academy, we'll gather our strength and inflict such suffering upon them they'll wish Shakan had ripped THEM apart.

Wow. I don't usually get that mad.
